Thanks this game is fun. For those having trouble with the controls use the right cntrl (1) and the enter (3) key to dodge the boulder. Apparently these keys are listed in the game as keys 1 and 3. You cant use these keys while playing using the mouse. Select the other version (non mouse). That's how I'm able to play the game using the keyboard. Thanks Zingooo you rock.

Yes it works but the whole game has to be viewed letterbox.

There is a launcher which lets you change widescreen, it lets you change between TWO resolutions,

The launcher is NOT for the mouse support .exe, so if you want to change the VERY limited graphical settings you cannot use the mouse.

Completely and utterly fucking pointless this game even existing,

Download a PS2 emulator and put your copy of RE4 into the DVD drive.

IF you want to play at 800x600 letterboxed then yeh go ahead.
